query.q: M::`aws_AWS/Kafka`:(LAST(`BytesInPerSec_Average`) AS `入流量`) { `Cluster Name` = '#{host}' and `Broker ID` = '#{BrokerID}' and `Topic` = '#{topic}' }
M::`aws_AWS/Kafka`:(LAST(`BytesOutPerSec_Average`) AS `出流量`) { `Cluster Name` = '#{host}' and `Broker ID` = '#{BrokerID}' and `Topic` = '#{topic}' }
M::`aws_AWS/Kafka`:(LAST(`ProduceTotalTimeMsMean_Maximum`) AS `总计时间`) { `Cluster Name` = '#{host}' and `Broker ID` = '#{BrokerID}' }
M::`aws_AWS/Kafka`:(LAST(`ProduceMessageConversionsTimeMsMean_Maximum`) AS `消息转换时间`) { `Cluster Name` = '#{host}' and `Broker ID` = '#{BrokerID}' }
M::`aws_AWS/Kafka`:(LAST(`ProduceRequestQueueTimeMsMean_Maximum`) AS `请求队列时间`) { `Cluster Name` = '#{host}' and `Broker ID` = '#{BrokerID}' }
M::`aws_AWS/Kafka`:(LAST(`ProduceResponseQueueTimeMsMean_Maximum`) AS `响应队列时间`) { `Cluster Name` = '#{host}' and `Broker ID` = '#{BrokerID}' }
